Это, пожалуй, машинного перевода:
Замечания от владельца/агента:

Minimum length of stay is 3 days
Disabled/Wheelchair friendly: No
Pets Considered/Allowed
Suitable for Elder: Ask
Suitable for Children: Yes
Location: This comfy and spacious apartment is perfectly located at Lisbon’s Historical Center. In Liberdade neighbourhood, where you can find everything, from the traditional handcraft shop, to top tier fashion brands for shopping. Luxury and traditional Restaurants, Bars, Coffee shops, Theatres’, and the oldest Cinema In town (S. Jorge) is at your door step. In your backyard there are two theatres always with different performances and you can take a walk in the fantastic botanic garden or listen a Jazz concert in the old and famouse Hot Club. You can walk to Chiado and Bairro Alto and enjoy the great nightlife of Lisbon. In the weekends you have typical street markets in Alegria garden, 1 minute from the apartment. This nice and secure neighbourhood offers you a very interesting mixture between tradition and modern. Access: At the doorstep you have the subway station (Avenida) and BUS stop, so you can get everywhere from here. You can also walk to the railway or boat stations that can take you to the beaches around Lisbon, or to other nice places such as Sintra or Cascais. You also have the “Sightseeing BUS” passing by which is a good option if you want do visit Lisbon by bus.
